page.title: 04Life-Styles in Yetholm
page.content: In Kirk Yetholm, the official end of the famous 402 kilometre long walk the {Pennine Way,}is the Border Hotel. The Hotel has rooms tp let as well as serving bar lunches, snacks, and, evening meals in the newly opened dining room. As well as the Hotel there are two Bed and Breakfast Houses and the Valley Deane Guest House. Across the Bowmont River in{Town {Yetholm}is another Hotel, the Plough, also serving bar lunches, and snacks, along with rooms to let. Just across the road is the Greenside Guest House, the former site of the White Swan Hotel, this Hotel has just closed down in the past five years. Also in{Town {Yetholm}are three Bed and Breakfast Houses. Prices for Bed and Breakfast Houses range from Â£7 in the private houses to Â£11 in the Hotels.
